attributes.title: Seeking Is The Essence Of Life
attributes.description:
In today’s Nithya Satsang (11th October 2015) from Varanasi, Paramahamsa Nithyananda, dwells into the 16th verse of Isavasya Upanishad, in which the Rishis are declaring their realization after explaining about the pure seeking in verse 15. The moment authentic seeking is awakened in us, simply the realization happens. Beautifully expanding on ‘status-quo’ and ‘state-quo’, He explains that people are stuck with status-quo in the same thought patterns and idea about themselves and others. State-quo is being established in the ultimate truth and constantly radiating maturity in your thinking, words, feeling, actions, everything. Context getting matured is seeking. Having the best inner image is the greatest gift we can receive from the Guru. The essence of life is - soul getting matured, you seeking the state of awakening.
pūṣann ekarṣe yama sūrya prājāpatya vyūha raśmīn samūha tejaḥ |
